description: Reference plate with 4 AprilTags for Phase 4 U-frame definition (Option U2)
note: Tag centers define reference plate coordinate system. This provides metrology-grade U-frame with scale sanity check.

u_frame_definition.x_axis: Direction from Tag 1 to Tag 2 (left to right)
u_frame_definition.y_axis: Direction from Tag 1 to Tag 3 (bottom to top)
u_frame_definition.z_axis: Normal to plate (right-hand rule: X × Y)

note_validation: Scale sanity check: computed distances must match validation_distances within ±0.02mm (20 µm)
